text: 7.7: Mt 19.12; FG 26.29; 1 Ko 12.11Gu vuzvugi, kha mbigi gu gumgi, mbe zam nan farar muuŋgip sɨɨŋra kɨrga. Fhe Bakɨme za kha gumgi bevbevira, ana mbarkɨrga ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ gum ŋaarir muun zav ŋkasŋkagir mbe nɨɨŋgi. Guma mbe, ana ndɨkndɨga vhuuŋ gum ŋkasŋka mben ana nɨɨŋgiap, harigi ne, ana harigi ndɨkndɨgar vhuuŋ gum ŋkasŋka ana nɨɨŋgi.
